  • Uses of Reservation in Controller

    Fields in Controller with type parameters of type Reservation 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> ReservationController.reservationList
    The collection of reservations
    Methods in Controller that return Reservation 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Reservation ReservationController.checkExistence​(java.lang.String reservationID)
    Return Reservation object if reservationID matches Update reservation status as expired if status is confirmed or waitlist, and checkin date is after current date Update reservation status to confirms if status is in waitlist and room is available
    Reservation ReservationController.getCheckInReservation​(java.lang.String roomID)
    Return Reservation Object from list of reservations that are checked in Search using registered roomID
    Methods in Controller that return types with arguments of type Reservation 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> ReservationController.getReservationList()
    Return list of reservations return ArrayList of Reservation
    java.util.Map<ReservationStatus,​java.util.List<Reservation>> ReservationController.splitReservationByStatus()
    Splits reservations into separate lists according to status

  • Uses of Reservation in Mediator

    Methods in Mediator with parameters of type Reservation 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private Room CheckInOut.assignRoom​(Reservation reservation)
    Return first vacant room of reservation roomType No updates to room and reservation details in this function
    void CheckInOut.printReceipt​(Reservation reservation, float roomDiscount, float orderDiscount)
    Calculate and print receipt of a reservation - Weekends bookings (Fri-Sat & Sat-Sun) cost 10% more - GST rate = 7% - Service Charge rate = 10% - Room and order discounts are applied separately to allow for further expansion
    private boolean CheckInOut.validCheckIn​(Reservation reservation)
    Check if reservation is invalid for checkin - reservation object is null - reservation checkin date is not current date - reservation status is not confirm status
    private boolean CheckInOut.validCheckOut​(Reservation reservation)
    Check if reservation is invalid for checkout - reservation object is null - reservation status is not checkin status
    private boolean CheckInOut.validRoomChange​(Reservation reservation, Room room)
    Check if change room request is invalid - Reservation object is null - Room object is null - Change date is not checkin date (can only change on checkin date) - New room is not vacant
